changes.comment: api-client-tiger: Generated client now exports individual core API methods (e.g., EntitiesApi_GetEntityWorkspaceDataFilters, DashboardsApi_GetAllEntitiesAnalyticalDashboards) directly via the entry point. These core methods are tree-shakable and represent the preferred way to use the API. Factory methods (e.g., tigerEntitiesObjectsClientFactory) remain available for backward compatibility.
